title: Flyer exhibition
content:
I have made this flyer, but I'm not yet pleased with the result. I'm  
not happy about the fonts I have used and I am not sure about the  
composition of the typography. I am pleased with the background.

We want to use a sans-serif and a serif which complement each other or  
collide with each other.

Any criticism is welcome.

Thank you.
author: artgrr

comments.content:
I can see it in my mind...its very interesting, yet ambiguous!  
~ 3r
